item.title: It: java
item.description:
Collection vs Stream

Collection Stream
Iterator로 모든 요소를 순회 해야한다. filter 로 일부 요소들만 순회할 수 있다.
메모리에 모든 요소가 load 된 상태에서 결과를 계산한다. 계산식을 미리 적어두고 계산시에 람다식으로 jvm에 넘긴다.
메모리 사용량이 늘어난다. 메모리 사용량이 줄어든다.

함수형 인터페이스

default 메소드를 제외한 메소드가 1개만 있을 경우 아래와 같이 사용 가능합니다.

함수 역할을 하는 객체

(class Collections) void sort(List list, Comparator<? super T> c)
    {
      ApiTxLogMapper mapper = springContext.getBean(ApiTxLogMapper.class);
      List<Map<String, Object>> list = mapper.selectLogList_map(null);
      java.util.Collections.sort(list, (o1, o2) -> {
        final String cmpKey = "txdt";
        return o1.get(cmpKey).toString().compareTo(o2.get(cmpKey).toString());
      });
      java.util.Collections.sort(list,
          (o1, o2) -> o1.get("txdt").toString().compareTo(o2.get("txdt").toString()));
      list.forEach(klog::print);
    }
(interface Predicate) boolean test(T t)
    {
      java.util.function.Predicate<Integer> predicate1 = new java.util.function.Predicate<Integer>() {
        @Override
        public boolean test(Integer n) {
          return !(n == null || n <= 0);
        }
      };
      klog.print("predicate1.test(null){25}", predicate1.test(null) + "");
      klog.print("predicate1.test(-10){25}", predicate1.test(-1) + "");
      klog.print("predicate1.test(0){25}", predicate1.test(0) + "");
      klog.print("predicate1.test(3){25}", predicate1.test(1) + "");

      System.out.println();
      java.util.function.Predicate<Integer> predicate2 = n -> !(n == null || n <= 0);
      for (int i = -2; i < 3; i++) {
        klog.print("predicate2.test(" + i + "){25}", "{}", predicate2.test(i));
      }
    }
(interface BiPredicate) boolean test(T t, U u)
    System.out.println();
    {
      Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("[a-z]+[0-9]+");
      List<String> list1 = Arrays.asList("mgkim", "mgkim0818", "lislroow0719");
      
      BiPredicate<Pattern, String> b1 = (p, str) -> p.matcher(str).find();
      
      list1.stream().filter(str -> b1.test(pattern, str)).forEach(klog::print);
    }
(interface Consumer) void accept(T t)
    System.out.println();
    {
      java.util.function.Consumer<Integer> consumer = (n) -> klog.print("n{15}", n + "");
      consumer.accept(3);
    }

    System.out.println();
    {
      List<String> list1 = Arrays.asList("kim", "myeonggu", "mgkim");
      java.util.function.Consumer<List<String>> consumer1 = (list) -> {
        for (int i=0; i<list.size(); i++) {
          list.set(i, String.format("%d. %s", i, list.get(i)));
        }
      };
      java.util.function.Consumer<List<String>> consumer2 = (list) -> {
        list.forEach(klog::print);
      };
      consumer1.andThen(consumer2).accept(list1);
    }
(interface BiConsumer<T, U>) void accept(T t, U u)
    System.out.println("BiConsumer > andThen > accept");
    {
      BiConsumer<Integer, Integer> bi1 = (n1, n2) -> klog.print("bi1{10}", "Math.pow: {}", Math.pow(n1, n2));
      BiConsumer<Integer, Integer> bi2 = (n1, n2) -> klog.print("bi2{10}", "sum: {}", n1+n2);
      bi1.andThen(bi2).accept(3, 2);
      
      Map<String, Integer> map = Map.ofEntries(
          Map.entry("a", 1),
          Map.entry("b", 2));
      map.forEach((key, value) -> klog.print("map.forEach{20}", "{}: {}", key, value));
    }
(interface Supplier) T get()
    {
      java.util.function.Supplier<Integer> supplier = () -> {
        return 1;
      };
      Integer n = supplier.get();
      klog.print("n{15}", n+"");
    }
(interface Comparator) int compare(T o1, T o2)
(interface Function<T, R>) R apply(T t)
    {
      Map<String, Integer> map1 = Map.ofEntries(
          Map.entry("mgkim", 1),
          Map.entry("lislroow", 3),
          Map.entry("nameless", 2));
      klog.print("map1{10}", map1+"");
      Set<Map.Entry<String, Integer>> entrySet1 = map1.entrySet();
      entrySet1.stream()
        //.map(Map.Entry::getKey)
        //.sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
        .sorted(Map.Entry.<String, Integer>comparingByValue())
        .forEach(klog::print);
      
      String json = "[{\"id\": \"mgkim\", \"no\": 30},{\"id\": \"nameless\", \"no\": 33},{\"id\": \"lislroow\", \"no\": 24}]";
      ObjectMapper om = new ObjectMapper();
      List<Map<String, Object>> list = om.readValue(json, List.class);
      klog.print("list{10}", list+"");
    }
    {
      System.out.println();
      Predicate<Map.Entry<String, Object>> match = (e) -> "no".equals(e.getKey()) && Integer.parseInt(e.getValue().toString()) / 20 > 0 ;
      Function<Map<String, Object>, Integer> cmp = (Map<String, Object> map) -> Integer.parseInt(map.get("no").toString());
      List<Map<String, Object>> list2 = list.stream()
        .sorted(Comparator.comparing(cmp))
        .collect(ArrayList::new,
            (newlist, map) -> {
              if (map.entrySet().stream().anyMatch(match)) {
                newlist.add(map);
              }
            },
            List::addAll);
      list2.stream().forEachOrdered(klog::print);
    }
    {
      System.getProperties().entrySet().stream()
        .filter((Map.Entry<Object, Object> entry) -> entry.getKey().toString().contains("encoding"))
        .forEach(klog::print);
    }
(interface BiFunction<T, U, R>) R apply(T t, U u)
    System.out.println();
    {
      BiFunction<Integer, Integer, Boolean> bi1 = (n1, n2) -> {
        return (n1 + n2) > 0;
      };
      boolean result = bi1.apply(1, -3);
      klog.print("BiFunction{10}", "bi1.apply(1, -3): {}", result);
    }

(interface Stream)

    {
      ApiTxLogMapper mapper = springContext.getBean(ApiTxLogMapper.class);
      List<Map<String, Object>> list = mapper.selectLogList_map(null);
      int sum1 = list.stream().mapToInt(item -> "20220121".equals(item.get("txdt")) ? 1 : 0).sum();
      klog.print("sum1{15}", sum1 + "");

      System.out.println();
      List<Map<String, Object>> list1 = list.stream().limit(1).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("list.size(){15}", list.size() + "");
      klog.print("list1.size(){15}", list1.size() + "");

      System.out.println();
      List<Map<String, Object>> list2 = list.stream().skip(1).limit(1).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("list1{15}", list1 + "");
      klog.print("list2{15}", list2 + "");

      System.out.println();
      List<Map<String, Object>> list3 = list.stream().sorted(Comparator.comparing((Map<String, Object> m) -> {
        return m.get("txdt").toString();
      }).reversed()).collect(Collectors.toList());

      klog.print("list1{15}", list1 + "");
      klog.print("list3{15}", list3 + "");
      List<Integer> nList1 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "3:c", "4:d", "5:e").stream()
          .map(s -> Integer.parseInt(s.split(":")[0])).collect(Collectors.toList());
      List<Integer> nList2 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "3:c", "4:d", "5:e").stream().flatMap(s -> {
        int n = Integer.parseInt(s.split(":")[0]);
        return Stream.of(n);
      }).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("nList1{15}", nList1 + "");
      klog.print("nList2{15}", nList2 + "");

      List<Integer> nList3 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "3:c", "4:d", "4:d", "5:e").stream()
          .map(s -> Integer.parseInt(s.split(":")[0])).collect(Collectors.toList());
      Set<Integer> nSet1 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "3:c", "4:d", "4:d", "5:e").stream()
          .map(s -> Integer.parseInt(s.split(":")[0])).collect(Collectors.toSet());
      klog.print("nList3{15}", nList3 + "");
      nList3.forEach(klog::print);
      klog.print("nSet1{15}", nSet1 + "");
      nSet1.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<String> sList1 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "c:3", "d:4").stream()
          .flatMap(s -> Arrays.stream(s.split(":"))).collect(Collectors.toList());
      sList1.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<String> sList2 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "c:3", "d:4").stream()
          .flatMap(s -> Arrays.stream(s.split(":")))
          .filter(s -> org.apache.commons.lang3.math.NumberUtils.isDigits(s)).collect(Collectors.toList());
      sList2.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      Set<Set<String>> sSet1 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "c:3", "d:4").stream()
          .map(s -> Arrays.stream(s.split(":")).collect(Collectors.toSet())).collect(Collectors.toSet());
      sSet1.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      Set<String> sSet2 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "c:3", "d:4").stream()
          .map(s -> Arrays.stream(s.split(":")).collect(Collectors.toSet()))
          .collect(HashSet::new, Set::addAll, Set::addAll);
      sSet2.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<String> sSet3 = Arrays.asList("1:a", "2:b", "c:3", "d:4").stream()
          .map(s -> Arrays.stream(s.split(":")).collect(Collectors.toList()))
          .collect(ArrayList<String>::new, List::addAll, List::addAll).stream()
          .filter(s -> !org.apache.commons.lang3.math.NumberUtils.isDigits(s)).collect(Collectors.toList());
      sSet3.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<String> sSet4 = Arrays.asList("1:c", "2:a", "3:b", "d:4").stream()
          .map(s -> Arrays.stream(s.split(":")).collect(Collectors.toList()))
          .collect(ArrayList<String>::new, List::addAll, List::addAll).stream()
          .filter(s -> !org.apache.commons.lang3.math.NumberUtils.isDigits(s))
          //.sorted(Comparator.comparing(s -> { return s; }).reversed())
          //.sorted(Comparator.comparing(s -> { return s.toString(); }).reversed())
          .sorted(Comparator.comparing(String::toString).reversed()).collect(Collectors.toList());
      sSet4.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      Integer[][] nArr1 = new Integer[][] { { 1, 3, 5 }, { 2, 4 } };
      Set<Integer> nSet2 = Arrays.stream(nArr1).flatMap(n -> Arrays.stream(n)).collect(Collectors.toSet());
      nSet2.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<Integer> nList4 = Arrays
          .asList("0|c", "1|a", "2|b", "3|d").stream().collect(ArrayList<Integer>::new,
              (set, str) -> set.add(Integer.parseInt(str.split("\\|")[0])), List::addAll)
          .stream().sorted((o1, o2) -> {
            return o1 - o2;
          }).collect(Collectors.toList());
      nList4.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<Integer> nList5 = Arrays.asList("0|c", "3|a", "2|b", "1|d").stream()
          .collect(ArrayList<Integer>::new, (set, str) -> set.add(Integer.parseInt(str.split("\\|")[0])),
              List::addAll)
          .stream()
          .sorted(java.util.Comparator.comparing(Integer::valueOf, java.util.Collections.reverseOrder()))
          //.sorted()
          //.sorted(java.util.Collections.reverseOrder())
          .collect(java.util.stream.Collectors.toList());
      nList5.forEach(klog::print);
    }
  • 함수형 인터페이스: 추상 메서드가 1개인 인터페이스. Predicate, Supplier, Consumer, Function, Comparator 가 있음
  • Lambda식은 함수형 인터페이스를 화살표 ->로 표현
  • Stream은 데이터의 가공 및 처리를 chaining 형태의 api를 제공하는 인터페이스
  • Lambda식에서는 접근하는 외부 지역변수는 final 선언과 같이 변경되어서는 안 됨.
  • stream 객체는 재사용 불가, 최적화 안 됨.
(method reference) 메소드 레퍼런스

형식: ClassName::MethodName

static 메소드, instance 메소드, constructor 에 사용할 수 있음

    System.out.println();
    {
      List<String> list = Arrays.asList("yyyy.MM.dd", "yyyy-MM-dd");
      Date today = new Date();
      list.stream().map(SimpleDateFormat::new) // constructor 예시: string 을 인자로 생성자 호출
        .map(format -> format.format(today))
        .forEach(klog::print);
    }
(SummaryStatistics)

count, min, max, sum, average 제공

IntSummaryStatistics, LongSummaryStatistics, DoubleSummaryStatistics

    System.out.println("IntSummaryStatistics");
    {
      List<Integer> list = IntStream.range(1, 10).boxed().collect(Collectors.toList());
      IntSummaryStatistics stat = list.stream().mapToInt(n -> n).summaryStatistics();
      klog.print("Average{20}", stat.getAverage()+"");
      klog.print("Count{20}", stat.getCount()+"");
      klog.print("Max{20}", stat.getMax()+"");
      klog.print("Min{20}", stat.getMin()+"");
      klog.print("Sum{20}", stat.getSum()+"");
    }
    System.out.println("Collectors.summarizingInt");
    {
      List<String> list = Arrays.asList("mgkim", "lislroow", "kim");
      IntSummaryStatistics stat = list.stream().collect(Collectors.summarizingInt(String::length));
      klog.print("Average{20}", stat.getAverage()+"");
      klog.print("Count{20}", stat.getCount()+"");
      klog.print("Max{20}", stat.getMax()+"");
      klog.print("Min{20}", stat.getMin()+"");
      klog.print("Sum{20}", stat.getSum()+"");
    }
(collect)
  • List 혹은 Set 형태의 자료형 생성
  • 항목들을 joining
  • sorting 후 가장 큰 항목 반환
  • stream 의 평균값 반환

collect(Supplier supplier, BiConsumer accumulator, BiConsumer combiner)

    System.out.println();
    {
      String joining = Stream.of("mgkim", "lislroow", "kim").collect(Collectors.joining(" | "));
      klog.print("Collectors.joining{40}", joining);
    }
    {
      Optional<String> maxByLength = Stream.of("mgkim", "lislroow", "kim")
          .collect(Collectors.maxBy(Comparator.comparingInt(String::length)));
      klog.print("Collectors.maxBy{40}", maxByLength.get());
    }
    {
      Double average = Stream.of("mgkim", "lislroow", "kim")
          .collect(Collectors.averagingInt(String::length));
      klog.print("Collectors.averagingInt{40}", average+"");
    }
    {
      Map<String, HttpMessageConverter> converter = springContext.getBeansOfType(HttpMessageConverter.class);
      converter.entrySet().stream().forEach(
          (Map.Entry<String,HttpMessageConverter> entry) -> 
            klog.print("converter", "beanId: '{}'  beanClass: '{}'", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue().getClass().getSimpleName()));
    }
    {
      Map<String, HttpMessageConverter> converter = springContext.getBeansOfType(HttpMessageConverter.class);
      Map<String, String> map = converter.entrySet().stream()
          .collect(Collectors.toMap(entry -> entry.getKey()
              , entry -> entry.getValue().getClass().getSimpleName()));
      klog.print("Collectors.toMap{40}", map+"");
    }
    {
      Map<String, HttpMessageConverter> converter = springContext.getBeansOfType(HttpMessageConverter.class);
      List<Map<String, String>> result = converter.entrySet().stream()
          .collect(ArrayList<Map<String, String>>::new,
              (list, entry) -> {
                Map<String, String> map = new HashMap<String, String>();
                map.put("id", entry.getKey());
                map.put("beanClass", entry.getValue().getClass().getSimpleName());
                list.add(map);
              },
              List::addAll);
      klog.print("collect(supplier, accumulator, combiner){40}", result+"");
    }
    {
      Map<String, String> map = Map.ofEntries(
          Map.entry("1st", "1"),
          Map.entry("first", "1"),
          Map.entry("2nd", "2"),
          Map.entry("3rd", "3"));
      Map<String, String> result = map.entrySet().stream()
          .collect(Collectors.toMap(entry -> entry.getValue()
              , entry -> entry.getKey()
              , (existValue, newValue) -> existValue+"/"+newValue)); // 같은 key가 있을 경우 새로운 값으로 치환
      result.forEach((key, value) -> klog.print("Collectors.toMap{40}", "key: {}  value: {}", key, value));
    }
(Reduction)
    System.out.println();
    {
      Stream<Integer> stream = IntStream.rangeClosed(1, 10).boxed();
      Optional<Integer> reduction = stream.reduce((n1, n2) -> n1 + n2);
      reduction.ifPresent(n -> klog.print("reduce() sum(1 ... 10){40}", n)); // 55
    }
    {
      Stream<Integer> stream = IntStream.rangeClosed(1, 10).boxed();
      Integer reduction = stream.reduce(10, (total, n) -> total + n);
      klog.print("reduce() 10 + sum(1 ... 10){40}", reduction); // 65
    }
    {
      Stream<Integer> stream = IntStream.rangeClosed(1, 10).boxed();
      Integer reduction = stream.parallel().reduce(10, (total, n) -> total + n);
      klog.print("parallel().reduce() 10 + sum(1 ... 10){40}", reduction); // 155
    }
(Optional)
    System.out.println();
    {
      Optional<String> opt = Optional.of("hello");
      klog.print("general{20}", opt.get());
    }
    {
      Optional<String> opt = Optional.ofNullable(null);
      try {
        String val = opt.get();
      } catch (NoSuchElementException e) {
        klog.print("null{20}", e.getMessage()); // No value present
      }
    }
    {
      Optional<String> opt = Optional.ofNullable(null);
      if (opt.isPresent()) {
        klog.print("opt value {}{20}", opt.get());
      } else {
        klog.print("present{20}", "opt value is null");
      }
    }
    {
      Optional<String> opt = Optional.ofNullable(null);
      klog.print("orElse{20}", "opt value {}", opt.orElse("or-else-value"));
    }
    {
      Optional<String> opt = Optional.ofNullable(null);
      klog.print("orElseGet{20}", "opt value {}", opt.orElseGet(() -> Integer.toString(Integer.MAX_VALUE)));
    }
    {
      Optional<String> opt = Optional.ofNullable(null);
      try {
        opt.orElseThrow(NullPointerException::new);
      } catch (NullPointerException e) {
        klog.print("orElseThrow{20}", "e {}", e.getClass().getSimpleName());
      }
    }
(max, min)
    System.out.println();
    {
      String[] array = springContext.getBeanDefinitionNames();
      Optional<String> max = Arrays.stream(array).max((s1, s2) -> s1.length() - s2.length());
      klog.print("max{40}", "{}", max.get());
    }
    {
      String[] array = springContext.getBeanDefinitionNames();
      Optional<String> max = Arrays.stream(array).max(String::compareToIgnoreCase);
      klog.print("max(String::compareToIgnoreCase){40}", "{}", max.get());
    }
    {
      String[] array = springContext.getBeanDefinitionNames();
      Optional<String> min = Arrays.stream(array).min(String::compareToIgnoreCase);
      klog.print("min(String::compareToIgnoreCase){40}", "{}", min.get());
    }
(Stream.concat)
    System.out.println();
    {
      List<String> list1 = Arrays.asList("1", "2");
      List<String> list2 = Arrays.asList("a", "b");
      List<String> merged = Stream.concat(list1.stream(), list2.stream()).collect(Collectors.toList());
      merged.forEach(klog::print);
    }
(Stream.distinct)

equals(), hashCode() 가 정의 되어있어야 함

    System.out.println();
    {
      List<String> list = Arrays.asList("1", "2", "1");
      List<String> unique = list.stream().distinct().collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("unique{20}", unique); // [1, 2]
    }
(limit, skip)
    System.out.println();
    {
      List<Double> list = Stream.generate(Math::random).limit(5).collect(Collectors.toList());
      list.forEach(klog::print);
    }
    {
      List<Integer> list = IntStream.rangeClosed(1, 10).boxed().skip(3).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("skip{20}", list); // [4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10]
    }
Stream 생성
  • Stream.of()
  • Stream.generate()
  • Stream.iterate()
    System.out.println();
    {
      List<String> list = Stream.of("hello", "java", "world").collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("Stream.of(){30}", list); // [hello, java, world]
    }
    {
      List<String> list = Stream.generate(() -> "ECHO").limit(3).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("Stream.generate(){30}", list); // [ECHO, ECHO, ECHO]
    }
    {
      List<Integer> list = Stream.generate(() -> Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 5)).limit(3).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("Stream.generate(){30}", list); // [0, 1, 1]
    }
    {
      List<Integer> list = Stream.iterate(3, (n) -> n * 10).limit(5).collect(Collectors.toList());
      klog.print("Stream.generate(){30}", list); // [3, 30, 300, 3000, 30000]
    }
initial operation
  • Arrays.stream(arr)
  • list.stream()
intermediate operation
  • filter()
  • map():
  • flatMap(): 중첩 구조를 한 단계 제거하고 map() 과 같은 처리를 함
  • sorted()
  • distinct()
terminal operation
  • count()
  • forEach()
  • collect()
  • anyMatch(), allMatch()

misc

    {
      List<Integer> list = Arrays.asList(1, 2, 3);
      list.stream().sorted(Integer::compare).forEach(klog::print);

      int UPPER = 64;
      int LOWER = 96;
      System.out.println();
      List<String> list1 = IntStream.rangeClosed(1, 26).mapToObj(n -> String.valueOf((char) (n + UPPER)))
          .collect(Collectors.toList());
      list1.forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println();
      List<Integer> list2 = list1.stream().map(s -> s.charAt(0) - UPPER).collect(Collectors.toList());
      list2.forEach(klog::print);
    }
    
    System.out.println();
    {
      List<Integer> list = IntStream.range(1, 100).boxed().collect(Collectors.toList());
      BiPredicate<Integer, Integer> b1 = (n1, n2) -> n1 % n2 == 0;
      
      list.stream().filter(n -> b1.test(n, 17)).forEach(klog::print);
    }

    Set<String> radix36Set = new HashSet<String>();
    int a = 10;
    while (a-- > 0) {
      System.out.println();
      UUID uuid1 = UUID.randomUUID();
      ByteBuffer buffer1 = ByteBuffer.wrap(new byte[16]);
      buffer1.putLong(uuid1.getMostSignificantBits());
      buffer1.putLong(uuid1.getLeastSignificantBits());
      
      BigInteger bint = new BigInteger(1, buffer1.array());
      UUID uuid2 = UUID.fromString(bint.toString(16).replaceFirst(
          "([0-9a-fA-F]{8})([0-9a-fA-F]{4})([0-9a-fA-F]{4})([0-9a-fA-F]{4})([0-9a-fA-F]+)",
          "$1-$2-$3-$4-$5"));
      klog.print("uuid1{15}", uuid1 + "");
      klog.print("uuid2{15}", uuid2 + "");
      
      String radix10 = bint.toString(10);
      String radix16 = bint.toString(16);
      String radix36 = bint.toString(36);
      klog.print("radix10{15}", radix10);
      klog.print("radix16{15}", radix16);
      klog.print("radix36{15}", radix36);
      
      radix36Set.add(radix36);
      
      BigInteger bint2 = new BigInteger(radix36, 36);
      UUID uuid3 = UUID.fromString(bint2.toString(16).replaceFirst(
          "([0-9a-fA-F]{8})([0-9a-fA-F]{4})([0-9a-fA-F]{4})([0-9a-fA-F]{4})([0-9a-fA-F]+)",
          "$1-$2-$3-$4-$5"));
      klog.print("uuid3{15}", uuid3 + "");
    }
    
    klog.print("size(){15}", radix36Set.size() + "");
    klog.print("length()!=25{15}", radix36Set.stream().filter(s -> s.length() != 25).count() + "");
    
    Map<Integer, List<String>> result = radix36Set.stream().collect(HashMap<Integer, List<String>>::new,
        (map, str) -> {
          Integer key = str.length();
          List<String> list = map.get(key);
          if (list == null) {
            list = new ArrayList<String>();
            map.put(key, list);
          }
          list.add(str);
        }, Map::putAll);

    {
      Object[] argv = new Object[] {"language", "locale korean dpName: {}, english dpName: {}", Locale.KOREAN.getDisplayName(), Locale.ENGLISH.getDisplayName()};
      String mdc_label = KStringUtil.nvl(argv[0]);
      String msg_format = KStringUtil.nvl(argv[1]);
      Object[] msgv = Arrays.stream(argv).skip(2).collect(Collectors.toList()).toArray(Object[]::new);
      Arrays.stream(msgv).forEach(System.out::println);
      log.info(msg_format, msgv);
    }

    // 
    {
      String string = "Some string with {the data I want} inside and {another data I want}.";
      java.util.regex.Pattern pattern = java.util.regex.Pattern.compile("\\{(.*?)\\}");

      System.out.println("# substringsBetween");
      String[] substrs = org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils.substringsBetween(string, "{", "}");
      Arrays.stream(substrs).forEach(klog::print);

      System.out.println("# Pattern.compile > matcher > results > map");
      pattern.matcher(string)
        .results()
        .map(mr -> mr.group(1))
        .forEach(klog::print);
      
      System.out.println("# Pattern.compile > matcher > replaceAll");
      String replstr = pattern.matcher(string).replaceAll((mr) -> {
        return String.format("{%s}", mr.group(1).toUpperCase());
      });
      klog.print("replstr", replstr);
    }

    {
      List<String> list = Arrays.asList("kim", "myeonggu", "mgkim");
      String[] array = list.stream().map(String::toUpperCase).toArray(String[]::new);
      Arrays.stream(array).forEach(klog::print);
    }

    System.out.println("int-array > (math.pow) > int-array");
    {
      int[] array = {1, 2, 3};
      IntStream stream = Arrays.stream(array);
      Integer[] newarray = stream
          .boxed()
          .map(n -> { return (int)Math.pow(n, 2); })
          .toArray(Integer[]::new);
      for (int item : newarray) {
        klog.print(item);
      }
    }
    
    System.out.println("int-array > (math.sqrt) > double-array");
    {
      int[] array = {1, 2, 4};
      IntStream stream = Arrays.stream(array);
      Double[] newarray = stream
          .boxed()
          .map(n -> { return Math.sqrt(n); })
          .toArray(Double[]::new);
      for (double item : newarray) {
        klog.print(item);
      }
    }

    System.out.println("int-array > (math.sqrt) > ifPresentOrElse");
    {
      int[] array = {1, 2, 4};
      IntStream stream = Arrays.stream(array);
      stream.boxed()
        .map(n -> { return Math.sqrt(n); })
        .filter(n -> n >= 2)
        .findFirst()
        .ifPresentOrElse(
            n -> klog.print("optional{10}", "{}", n), 
            () -> klog.print("optional{10}", "is null"));
      
    }
